subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Chas Dodd threw a 52-yard touchdown pass to tie the score with 3:53 to play and set up the winning field goal with a 45-yard pass.
snippet: Chas Dodd threw a 52-yard touchdown pass to tie the score with 3:53 to play and set up the winning field goal with a 45-yard pass.
